summary: In the Antarctic, every March since the beginning of time, the quest begins to find the perfect mate and start a family.
cast: Charles Berling|Romane Bohringer|Jules Sitruk|Morgan Freeman|Amitabh Bachchan|Jose Coronado|Sky du Mont|Gösta Ekman|Fiorello|Sofie Gråbøl|Hikari Ishida|Ryûnosuke Kamiki|Adrian Killian|Marek Kondrat|Andrea Kathrin Loewig|Torsten Michaelis|Takao Osawa
keywords: father son relationship|do or die|life cycle|moon|lonliness
title: El viaje del emperador
